summary: A man reviews a 2024 Chevy Silverado W/T, highlighting its features and price. He points out the lack of certain amenities like remote start and power folding mirrors, while noting the presence of power-adjustable mirrors and 255-7017 tires. The video focuses on the truck's affordability and practicality.
keywords: 2024, Chevy, Silverado, W/T, truck, review, features, price, remote start, power folding mirrors, power-adjustable mirrors, 255-7017 tires
